definitions: Rubbed or kneaded (a part of the body) with the hands to stimulate circulation, relieve tension, or provide relaxation.
Manipulated (data, figures, etc.) to present them in a more favorable way.
Applied gentle pressure and manipulation to (something) to make it more pliable or to improve its condition.
examples: The therapist massaged her sore shoulders.
He massaged the numbers to make the report look better.
She massaged the clay until it was soft.
